Articles.Content:
when i just open any game (New or used) i try to click and open a building (Any), it shows i can open it but when i click ether the game freezes or it is in a really long load that never ends.![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

Please anyone out there, your my only hope!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T02:15:47Z" title="04/29/2015 02:15  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by Master Tao**

Welcome to the forums!

First, could you try reinstalling the game from a fresh download or "[Verify the Integrity of Game Cache](https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=2037-QEUH-3335)" through Steam?

If you can reproduce it with a new install, please upload a copy of your output\_log.txt. Read the [thread=92230]Stock Support and Bug Reporting Guide[/thread] if you're not sure how to locate it.
We need the game logs, this could be caused by anything, please see the support stickies ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I'm still new at this wat is a "support stickie"

DarkPhantom,

You can find the support sticky here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide)

Your game log should be located in KSP\_Install/KSP\_Data/output\_log.txt. The sticky will explain how to get there and good places to upload the file.

Welcome to the forum (ish) ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw
